author: ebrondol
body:
#### PR description:

They can be used to create Tracksters without running everything. They are based on default step3 and step4.
They are added in `Validation/HGCalValidation/test/python/` and not run by default.

#### PR validation:

No change is expected.

informing @rovere @felicepantaleo
title: Add python config to run only TICL
